titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: WOMEN LYMPH NODES PATHOLOGY RESULT POSITIVE TOTAL - Description

div.p: WOMEN LYMPH NODES PATHOLOGY RESULT POSITIVE TOTAL is the total number of women who had a pathology examination with a positive result (CYTOLOGY RESULT CODE recorded as National Code 'C5' or NEEDLE CORE BIOPSY RESULT CODE FOR AXILLARY LYMPH NODE recorded as National Code 'LB5' ).
